attributes.action: Keep the A & E at the Princess Royal Hospital in Telford.
attributes.background: Telford is a fast growing Town & is the biggest Populated area in Shropshire, we have a greater need for a A & E Department than any other part of the County, we want our Accident & Emergency Department to remain at the Princess Royal Hospital.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105544

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
